name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Test Engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in software testing, including risk-based testing and boundary testing in regulated environments such as healthcare and finance. Proficient in creating and executing test scripts utilizing **SQL** for database verification. Well-versed in black-box, white-box, and gray-box testing methodologies, complemented by a strong analytical thinking and problem-solving skill set. Proven ability to collaborate effectively in team settings and communicate complex technical information clearly.

In addition to core testing skills, I bring hands-on expertise in modern technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with full stack experience across **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building and deploying cloud-native applications using **Azure** and **AWS**. My background includes leading teams to develop enterprise platforms incorporating AI/ML for enhanced analytics, while ensuring compliance with standards such as FDA regulations, HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Passionate about delivering reliable, impactful software solutions through rigorous testing and quality assurance practices.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Developed comprehensive test scripts for software applications in compliance with **FDA regulations**, emphasizing risk-based testing methodologies to ensure product safety and effectiveness.
•	Executed black-box, white-box, and gray-box testing strategies, aiding in the identification of **9** critical defects prior to release, resulting in a **25%** reduction of post-deployment issues.
•	Conducted boundary testing to ascertain application resilience and performance limits, successfully identifying and rectifying **7** edge cases that improved system stability.
•	Utilized SQL for database testing and validation, ensuring the integrity and accuracy of **10 million** records in health and financial applications.
•	Collaborated with cross-functional teams to communicate test status and findings, enhancing teamwork and fostering an environment of analytical thinking and problem-solving.
•	Designed and executed manual and automated tests using tools such as Jest, Cypress, and Postman to cover unit, integration, and end-to-end testing scenarios across both frontend and backend services.
•	Led discussions on testing strategies and approaches that align with **regulatory requirements**, ensuring all applications adhered to critical compliance standards.
•	Participated in continuous improvement initiatives to refine testing processes, resulting in a **15%** increase in testing efficiency and effectiveness over **1 year**.
•	Mentored junior testers on best practices in software testing methodologies and promoted effective communication and teamwork within the testing team.

Executed comprehensive software testing practices, including **black-box**, **white-box**, and **gray-box** testing methodologies, to ensure robust quality assurance of financial applications in adherence to FDA regulations.
Developed and executed risk-based testing strategies to prioritize testing efforts, ensuring critical functionalities were thoroughly validated under various scenarios for **financial platforms**.
Created detailed **test scripts** and conducted **boundary testing** to identify edge cases in application performance, contributing to an overall defect reduction of **25%**.
Collaborated effectively within cross-functional teams, enhancing communication across developers, product managers, and stakeholders to foster a culture of quality and continuous improvement in the testing process.
Utilized **SQL** for writing queries to validate data integrity and accuracy within the financial transaction systems, ensuring alignment with business requirements and user expectations.
Employed analytical thinking and problem-solving skills to investigate defects and maintain a clear, organized log of issues identified during testing phases, reducing total bug resolution time by **15%**.
Participated in regular test strategy meetings and agile ceremonies, providing feedback and insights based on testing outcomes, contributing to overall process enhancement and team efficiency.

Applied analytical thinking and problem-solving skills to develop and execute comprehensive test scripts, ensuring compliance with **FDA regulations** for software quality assurance.
Conducted risk-based testing methodologies, incorporating **black-box**, **white-box**, and **gray-box** testing techniques to assess software functionality and identify critical defects in **SQL** databases across multiple platforms.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance software reliability and performance, leveraging teamwork and communication skills to effectively address defects and implement improvements.
Executed boundary testing strategies that encompassed **SQL** queries to validate edge cases, ensuring robustness and reliability within the system.
Designed and implemented automated test scripts that increased testing efficiency by **30%**, significantly reducing manual testing efforts and improving software release cycles.
Provided detailed documentation and reporting of testing outcomes, facilitating evidence-based decision making and guiding development efforts to align with user requirements.
Mentored junior testers in best practices of software testing, enhancing team skill set and fostering a culture of quality throughout the software development life cycle.
